DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect Parent Management Training Oregon ( PMTO ) compare treatment usual ( TAU ) parent child age 3 12 show behavioral problem .
DOC.detailed_description: This project estimate causal effect Parent Management Training , Oregon ( PMTO ) Danish context . The study design RCT PMTO compare Treatment As Usual ( TAU ) . The target population parent child age 3 12 show behavioral problem . The primary outcome estimate change child behavior , measure three time : baseline , seven month follow-up , 19 month follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Families child eligible PMTO least one type family train program The family want participate
